dict.acceptation: 建筑师，设计师；创造者，缔造者；造物主；

sent.orig: As a client you blame the architect and as the architect, they blame you.
sent.trans: 作为一个客户，您责怪建筑师，作为建筑师，他们怪你。

sent.orig: Large-scale construction began in 1793, this personally as construction architect.
sent.trans: 大规模的施工从1793年开始，霍本亲自担任施工建筑师。

sent.orig: This, in fact, is exactly what the golf architect must do.
sent.trans: 实际上，这就是每个高尔夫设计师必须做的。

sent.orig: The architect specified oak for the wood trim.
sent.trans: 那位建筑师指定用橡木做木饰条。

sent.orig: A:Then I can tell you are a conventional architect.
sent.trans: 那么可以说你是个传统建筑师了。
